alert.note: Alert for Southern Jasper; Southern Newton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 5:22PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Beauregard and west central Calcasieu Parishes, southwestern Newton and southeastern Jasper Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 521 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Devils Pocket, or 7 miles north of Deweyville, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Starks, Buna, Deweyville, Wrights Settlement and Devils Pocket. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
